short_summary: Heavy construction services & Water main construction service
description: The project includes installation of pipe culverts, excavation/ditching and riprap end protection, placement of grout in abandoned previously used CSP culverts, and hydraulic seeding of disturbed areas.
full_summary:
**Bid for Drainage Improvements Project - Cancelled**
==============================================

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) [Ministère des Travaux publics et des Services gouvernementaux (SPAC)] has tendered the "Phase 2 - Drainage Improvements Project" [Travaux d'amélioration du drainage Phase 2], with a reference number of WS4234001903-Doc4258367230. This project has been cancelled.

Key Information
---------------

* **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-11-07T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start and End Dates**: Not specified
* **Region of Delivery**: British Columbia and Canada
* **Solicitation Number**: WS4234001903
* **Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) contact**:
	+ Simon Leung (SPAC/PSPC)
	+ Email: simon.leung@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
	+ Phone: N/A

**Project Overview**
-------------------

This project involved the installation of pipe culverts, excavation and ditching, and riprap end protection, as well as the placement of grout in abandoned previously used CSP culverts, and hydraulic seeding of disturbed areas. The sites are located between Km 228.80 and 367.20 of the Alaska Highway between Fort St. John and Fort Nelson, BC.

**Procurement Details**
----------------------

* **Procurement category**: Heavy construction services (UNSPSC codes 72140000 and 72141121)
* **Procurement method**: Competitive - selective tendering
* **Trade agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Selection criteria**: Lowest price

**Important Notice**
-------------------

Please note that this tender has been cancelled. There will be no further updates or continued solicitations for this project.
